snippet.title: Battlefield 1 - Turning Tides - North Sea Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Launch a North Sea assault with the new content of Battlefield 1 Turning Tides in January 2018, including the Heligoland Bight and Zeebrugge maps, the British Empire’s Royal Marines faction, and the C-Class Airship. Learn more about Battlefield 1 Turning Tides: http://x.ea.com/42632 

Trailer produced with The Two Scotsmen.

Join the fight today: http://x.ea.com/42631

Subscribe and be the first to see Battlefield 1 trailers and videos: http://bit.ly/270eMcA
